The claim states that the Obama administ: 3.7 million grant to the Wuhan Institute of Virology in China.
The expert: s verdict clarifies that a portion of the $3.7 million in grants awarded between 2014 and 2019 by the National Institutes of Health (NIH) went to EcoHealth Alliance, a global environmental health nonprofit organization. This organization helped fund research at the Wuhan Institute of Virology in China.
However: not all of the $3.7 million went directly to the Wuhan Institute of Virology, and not all of the funding took place under the Obama administration. Approximately $700,000 of the total amount was approved under Donald Trump.
The claim and the expert: s verdict were part of a larger discussion surrounding rumors and misinformation about the COVID-19 pandemic, with insinuations that the pandemic was Obama's fault due to the alleged funding.
